response.overview: I don't know what to say because the film was practically made itself. Definitely a gesture of admiration in the Netherlands and Dutch things. Certainly it is the 30 kilometer dyke which stretches in Friesland, to the north, "De Afsluitdijk". And certainly, I am sure, it is about grids and primary colors, and about Rebecca (the Beautiful one) that I know only slightly, and of this feeling of being (squarely) at the bottom of a landscape sculpted, refined and wild - a landscape (mooi ... mooi ... mooi ...) that made me silent, even peaceful ...
response.title: Mondrian Voor Rebecca
